channel.title: [NFoL] Newbie Forum of Lies 3 - Signup Thread
channel.description:
# Welcome to Forum of Lies!
New players will have priority on signups. Veterans to Forum of Lies may join as well, but keep in mind that this may be player's first games. I will reserve the right to keep certain players out of the game if I believe they won't mesh well.
# General Gameplay Information
Hosts are Geyde and Solic
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 24 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages. This includes copy pasting, directly translating, or using the forum quote feature. If the host sent you something and you want to say something about it in thread, please paraphrase. 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose. 6. Do NOT spam thread with non-game related content. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Days last 48 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * Day 1 lasts 24 hours and will not have an execution. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” (Host tip: Ping using @Geyde for voting so we can track the votes) * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
## Logs
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Deathnotes
* There are no deathnotes for BD killer classes. Neutral Killers and Unseen/Cult kills may use deathnotes, if they so wish.
### Rolelist: **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color] / [color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color] / [color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** / **[color=grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer [/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]**
## [Roles ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Playerlist
1. SabreOverDrive 2. Cheeki 3. Sulit 4. Minho 5. Fireslol 6. James 7. LadyThamasa 8. What 9. Gikkle 10. Eevee (VET) 11. MrEevee7 12. Andrej 13. Marcus_Doodalee (VET) 14. BlueStorm (VET) 15. Priestess (VET) 16. Mathblade (VET)
### Timestamp:
### Backups:
1. Datbird 5. Boss110 6. Possessed 7. Frostwolf103 8. WazzaAzza 11. Shurian 12. Icibalus
### Spectators:
1. Htm
